Miltos Manetas' Art After Videogames

this guy aparently was the first person to make machinima, but also pretty interested in the images generated by videogames as painting. there's an interesting manifesto in his website: "An artist after Videogames should not create anything himself but only extract the hidden notions of the game."
(external link)
